title: J&J says it's working to extend the shelf-life of its Covid-19 vaccine so doses don't expire
content:
1. J&J says it's working to extend the shelf-life of its Covid-19 vaccine so doses don't expire  CNN
  2. Millions of J&J Covid Vaccine Doses May Expire  NBC News
  3. J&J CEO says people will likely need Covid vaccine with annual flu shot for next several years as variants spread  CNBC
  4. EDITORIAL | SA can’t allow Covid politics to put lives at risk  TimesLIVE
  5. With J&J vaccines set to expire, Ohio plans to bring them closer to communities  WBNS 10TV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
J&J says it's working to extend the shelf-life of its Covid-19 vaccine so doses don't expire  CNN 
Millions of J&J Covid Vaccine Doses May Expire  NBC News
J&J CEO says people will likely need Covid vaccine with annual flu shot for next several years as variants spread  CNBC
EDITORIAL | SA can’t allow Covid politics to put lives at risk  TimesLIVE
With J&J vaccines set to expire, Ohio plans to bring them closer to communities  WBNS 10TV
View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: J&J社は、Covid-19ワクチンの保存期間を延長し、1回分のワクチンが期限切れにならないように努力しているという。
J&J公司表示，它正在努力延长其Covid-19疫苗的保质期，以便各剂量不会过期。
J&J公司表示，它正在努力延長其Covid-19疫苗的保質期，以便各劑量不會過期。
